description: Talibshah Hosseini ran with his family as fire engulfed the Moria migrant camp on the Greek island.
title: Moria camp: Afghan family helpless after fleeing Lesbos fire
title_page: Moria camp: Afghan family helpless after fleeing Lesbos fire - BBC News
maintext: "She keeps saying: 'Daddy I don't like you because you took my school from me, I am not happy.' It's so difficult for a father to let his child down," he says, close to tears. "I can't tell you how much it hurts."
